title: Five Minutes Fiction
description: This is a collection of nine very short stories, some funny, some thought provoking and some just downright silly. New Neighbours, will make you laugh. Subliminal Mind is what can happen to the mind when confronted with trauma. Mamma Knows Best and New Pastures will raise a chuckle and are true ‘Flash’, less than 120 words each. Be Careful What You Wish For, is about Janie a thoughtless teenager and the consequences of her actions. Invasion is about Masie and her family running for their lives as their world is relentlessly destroyed. Male and Female Coupling is something that happens to technophobes everywhere. And finally, Walk Don’t Stagger and Teaching Chickens are downright silly ‘Flash’
author: Carol Wills
